clinical_study.brief_title: The Clinical Trial of the Anti Hepatitis B Placenta Transfer Factor Injection
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy and Safety of the Anti Hepatitis B Placenta Transfer Factor Injection in the Treatment of HBeAg Positive Chronic Hepatitis B, Randomized, Double Blind, Placebo Controlled, Multi Center Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: Asses the efficacy and safety of the Anti hepatitis B placenta transfer factor injection in the treatment of HBeAg positive chronic hepatitis B.

detailed_description.textblock: This study using entecavir tablets as basic therapy, is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled multi center study, including the screening period (-4 weeks), baseline and treatment period (96 weeks). The treatment period of first 48 weeks, using entecavir tablets as basic treatment, placebo-controlled trials; the second 48 weeks, taking entecavir tablets alone, continue observation experiment.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: The HBeAg serum conversion rate of the Test Group and the Control Group after 48 weeks treatment

secondary_outcome.description: The HBeAg serum conversion rate of the Test Group and the Control Group for treatment week 24, week 72
The HBeAg disappearance rate of the Test Group and the Control Group for treatment week 24, week 48 and week 72
The proportion of subjects for each observation point in HBV DNA titer decreased 2 logarithmic

secondary_outcome.measure: The proportion of subjects for the HBV DNA can not be detected
secondary_outcome.description: The proportion of subjects for the HBV DNA can not be detected in treatment week 24, week 48 and week 72
The changes of HBeAg and HBsAg titer at each observation point
The quantitative changes of anti -HBc in each observation point
The variation of ALT in each observation point

secondary_outcome.measure: The seroconversion rate of HBsAb and HBeAb
secondary_outcome.description: The seroconversion rate of HBsAb and HBeAb in each observation point

secondary_outcome.measure: The resistance mutation rate of HBsAb and HBeAb
